title: msbeby
author: msbeby
content: I would like to advise experiences about the new campaign,

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 10, 2022, 06:56:51 PMI would like to advise experiences about the new campaign,What is your question? Are you interested in participating in a campaign or starting your own? What kind of campaign are you thinking about? If you want to start a new campaign for your project, it would be best if you hire an experienced campaign manager.Here you can find a list of some of the most reputable campaign managers:Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 10, 2022, 06:56:51 PMI would like to advise experiences about the new campaign,looking at your post history here, some posts were you trying to participate in the campaign or asking for some experienced advice. Probably the best advice to you is to dedicate yourself to improving yourself and your knowledge. you can find many quality discussions here and you will surely find something interesting and understandable for you.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: In your title and post, you are not quite specific on what exactly you are looking for especially given the fact that you were trying to register for bounties initially when you had just registered to the forum.Are you looking for a campaign manager to run a marketing campaign for your service?

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 10, 2022, 06:56:51 PMI would like to advise experiences about the new campaign,Are you looking for advice as a new campaign manager?  Isn't it?First, you need to have experience first joining signature and while joining learn how they manage a campaign either signature or bounty campaign.Here's a brief that came from @CryptopreneurBrainboss in joining a paid campaign that you must learn first.[Guide] Factors to consider before joining paid signature campaigns.{Facts} Benefits of promoting (joining) a quality paid signature campaign.{Facts} Disadvantage of promoting scam signature campaigns that encourage spam.Learn first before you'll manage your own campaign.

comments.author: msbeby
comments.created_time: October 11, 2022, 06:40:35 PMLast edit: October 11, 2022, 09:35:52 PM by mprep
comments.body: Quote from: sheenshane on October 10, 2022, 11:16:17 PMQuote from: msbeby on October 10, 2022, 06:56:51 PMI would like to advise experiences about the new campaign,Are you looking for advice as a new campaign manager?  Isn't it?First, you need to have experience first joining signature and while joining learn how they manage a campaign either signature or bounty campaign.Here's a brief that came from @CryptopreneurBrainboss in joining a paid campaign that you must learn first.[Guide] Factors to consider before joining paid signature campaigns.{Facts} Benefits of promoting (joining) a quality paid signature campaign.{Facts} Disadvantage of promoting scam signature campaigns that encourage spam.Learn first before you'll manage your own campaign. If I want to do a signature campaign, I have to get marit firstQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 10, 2022, 08:48:16 PMIn your title and post, you are not quite specific on what exactly you are looking for especially given the fact that you were trying to register for bounties initially when you had just registered to the forum.Are you looking for a campaign manager to run a marketing campaign for your service?How do I increase my knowledge What do I need to do to join Signature Camping?[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 11, 2022, 07:15:15 PMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 10, 2022, 08:48:16 PMIn your title and post, you are not quite specific on what exactly you are looking for especially given the fact that you were trying to register for bounties initially when you had just registered to the forum.Are you looking for a campaign manager to run a marketing campaign for your service?How do I increase my knowledge What do I need to do to join Signature Camping?you don't need to write a separate post for each individual reply. put them all together in one post. quote and write an answer below, then another quote and answer below that...regarding your participation in signature campaigns, you need to spend some time on the forum first. more time and more of your activities here.If you write 14 posts in two weeks, you will gain 14 activity points. here is a table of how many activities you need for any rank. there are of course merits as well, but I suggest that you get involved and do some research yourself.Quote from: theymos on January 24, 2018, 11:00:11 PMIn addition to activity, everyone now has a merit score, and you need both a certain activity level and a certain merit score in order to reach higher member ranks. The required scores are:RankRequired activityRequired meritBrand new00Newbie10Jr Member301Member6010Full Member120100Sr. Member240250Hero Member480500LegendaryRandom in the range 775-10301000

comments.author: msbeby
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 11, 2022, 07:50:19 PMQuote from: msbeby on October 11, 2022, 07:15:15 PMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 10, 2022, 08:48:16 PMIn your title and post, you are not quite specific on what exactly you are looking for especially given the fact that you were trying to register for bounties initially when you had just registered to the forum.Are you looking for a campaign manager to run a marketing campaign for your service?How do I increase my knowledge What do I need to do to join Signature Camping?you don't need to write a separate post for each individual reply. put them all together in one post. quote and write an answer below, then another quote and answer below that...regarding your participation in signature campaigns, you need to spend some time on the forum first. more time and more of your activities here.If you write 14 posts in two weeks, you will gain 14 activity points. here is a table of how many activities you need for any rank. there are of course merits as well, but I suggest that you get involved and do some research yourself.Quote from: theymos on January 24, 2018, 11:00:11 PMIn addition to activity, everyone now has a merit score, and you need both a certain activity level and a certain merit score in order to reach higher member ranks. The required scores are:RankRequired activityRequired meritBrand new00Newbie10Jr Member301Member6010Full Member120100Sr. Member240250Hero Member480500LegendaryRandom in the range 775-10301000If I have 30 activities, will I get marit automatically?I mean here only talking to you will get 30 activity I will get marit

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 11, 2022, 08:26:52 PMIf I have 30 activities, will I get marit automatically?I mean here only talking to you will get 30 activity I will get maritNo, merit there is nothing to do with the activity. You get merit points when someone recognizes your post as informative and constructive and then sends you some merit for one of your posts.I suggest you read the threads Merit & new rank requirements Newbie's Guide to Getting Merit (Proven)Guide for getting + Merit

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 11, 2022, 08:26:52 PMIf I have 30 activities, will I get marit automatically?I mean here only talking to you will get 30 activity I will get maritIt's a bad way to introduce yourself here, you will need to gain knowledge and then money may come as a result of this knowledge.Most good signature campaigns require a + full account  account which means 120 activity or 120 days, so during this period learn new things, improve the quality of your posts and you will join the campaign quickly.As for the quick race to participate in a campaign, it will make you give up the idea quickly.

comments.author: msbeby
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on October 13, 2022, 09:14:13 AMQuote from: msbeby on October 11, 2022, 08:26:52 PMIf I have 30 activities, will I get marit automatically?I mean here only talking to you will get 30 activity I will get maritIt's a bad way to introduce yourself here, you will need to gain knowledge and then money may come as a result of this knowledge.Most good signature campaigns require a + full account  account which means 120 activity or 120 days, so during this period learn new things, improve the quality of your posts and you will join the campaign quickly.As for the quick race to participate in a campaign, it will make you give up the idea quickly.Thanks for telling me.I am trying to get details about bitcointalk,,,What do you think is it wise to buy bitcoin at this time?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 13, 2022, 06:16:23 PMThanks for telling me.I am trying to get details about bitcointalk,,,What do you think is it wise to buy bitcoin at this time?what are you trying exactly? To spam over the forum with your crappy advice?don't act naive here and pretend like you really care, we are not such idiots. I will quote this here for future reference because your posts will probably be deleted by a moderator. Now you are much closer to the spammer tag than you will be close to participating in the campaign.Quote from: msbeby on October 13, 2022, 08:00:53 PMBitcoin Future review” – Is it a legit app or just another scam? - Are you thinking of investing in the Bitcoin Future platform? This Post is your way to go. The value of Bitcoin has radically increased over the years. The crypto that no one wanted to even talk about is now being traded throughout the world.  The traders of Bitcoin are increasing day by day due to its increasing value. But, having the best trading platform to trade Bitcoins in is the most important thing for any trader. If the platform is not legit, then you may end up losing all of your investment.  Quote from: msbeby on October 13, 2022, 08:07:46 PMBitcoin Future app is a digital currency trading platform where you can invest your Bitcoins and trade them wherever in the world you want. The Bitcoin Future is created in such a manner it can sell and purchase Bitcoins for you itself. 🤭Its algorithms work according to the fluctuation in the Bitcoin market, and when the prices are low then it buys the Bitcoins for you and when high this platform itself sells out your Bitcoins with a 99% success rate, which is Awesome. 😴

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Aside from the threads and links given to you OP. The pinned post on the Services about signature campaign guidelines is very helpful. Whether you want to join as a signature campaign participant or trying to become a manager or someone who wants to run his campaign through a hired manager. It's all detailed and will help you to understand how to be good at any of it.Link: Signature Campaign Guidelines (read this before starting or joining a campaign)

comments.author: Rigon
comments.body: Quote from: msbeby on October 10, 2022, 06:56:51 PMI would like to advise experiences about the new campaign,OP did you mean how to manage campaigns? If so then you have a lot to know. You must have prior experience in the job.  If you don't have experience, you can get experience working with any campaign manager you speak to and then apply through various channels to manage campaigns. There are also many experienced campaign managers to take advice from.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Rigon on December 28, 2022, 11:49:37 AMOP did you mean how to manage campaigns? If so then you have a lot to know. You must have prior experience in the job.  If you don't have experience, you can get experience working with any campaign manager you speak to and then apply through various channels to manage campaigns. There are also many experienced campaign managers to take advice from.Nobody has discussed in this topic for two months.Even more, OP was not online since October.And if you'd have the BPIP extension you'd also know that OP is also banned.I guess that a mod should really lock this topic...
